Package org.openpnp.gui.support

Class BoundProperty<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openpnp.model.AbstractModelObject
      • org.openpnp.gui.support.BoundProperty<T>
  • public class BoundProperty<T>
extends AbstractModelObject
    A simple value wrapper that provides PropertyChangeListener support. Can be used in place of basic fields.
